name: The Bae of Vei
description:
A gift based on The Binding of Isaac for Veibaes birthday made by a group of fans. Clear the floor and beat the boss.

Default Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Arrows: Shoot
  • E: Place bomb
  • F: Fullscreen

Credits:
